Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I do development on my Android device?  Morning everyone!Is there an app where I can program java for desktop computers (i.e. Jar files) on android?Where I can program and compile (and if possible run) on android.Reason:With the way technological development is going, I see the tablets bridging the gap between computers everyday, especially with the advent of quad cores.I know its a silly thought but I don't need a high end computer to program. I essentially want to get rid of my laptop, get a more versatile tablet and start programming on that.I thought of getting the asus infinity and dual booting ubuntu on that to get going.Maybe I'm being a bit naïve about these things so I have come to you guys for help. Any suggestions?Question:Is it possible to program desktop applications on an android enabled tablet somehow?Thanks in advance.
Title: Develop Java Swing Applications  on Android
